namelist.namelist_summary:
############################################################################### namelist_anav13jclim.xml
Description This namelist reproduces most of the figures of Anav et al. (2013)
Author Alessandro Anav (University of Exeter, UK - A.Anav@exeter.ac.uk)
Contributors Sabrina Wenzel (DLR, Germany - sabrina.wenzel@dlr.de) Mattia Righi (DLR, Germany - mattia.righi@dlr.de)
Project EMBRACE
Reference Anav, A., et al., J. Climate, 26, 6801-6843, doi:10.1175/JCLI-D-12-00417.1 (2013)
This namelist is part of the ESMValTool ###############################################################################

MODELS.model: ESGF_CMIP5 CanESM2 output1 CCCma CanESM2 historical NONE NONE MIP_VAR_DEF r1i1p1 latest 1986 2005 CMIP5_template
